mapper.select: SELECT OI.ORD_SEQ, OI.USER_SEQ, OI.ORD_SUMPRICE, OI.ORD_WAY, OI.ORD_DATE, OI.ORD_STATUS, OI.BUY_WAY, OI.USR_RCV_TIME, OI.RCV_TIME, OI.TID, OI.FT_SEQ, OI.TRAN_NO, OI.GPS_SEQ, UI.USER_NICK FROM ORDER_INFO OI INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON OI.USER_SEQ = UI.USER_SEQ ORDER BY ORD_DATE DESC

SELECT OI.ORD_SEQ, OI.USER_SEQ, OI.ORD_SUMPRICE, OI.ORD_WAY, OI.ORD_DATE, OI.ORD_STATUS, OI.BUY_WAY, OI.USR_RCV_TIME, OI.RCV_TIME, OI.TID, OI.FT_SEQ, OI.TRAN_NO, OI.GPS_SEQ, UI.USER_NICK FROM ORDER_INFO OI INNER JOIN USER_INFO UI ON OI.USER_SEQ = UI.USER_SEQ WHERE OI.${option} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%') ORDER BY OI.ORD_SEQ DESC
